ygData.subject: rune of scale
ygData.msgSnippet: I m one rune away from the Runescale ... Oh no...I was talking about the rune of scale for the Runescale cloak?   I understand it was supposed to be carried by
ygData.messageBody:
I'm one rune away from the Runescale
>>Cloak, I've been camping crocs in Guk but haven't found one yet. The
>>staff
>>of wheel rod stories kinda scare me so I might wait till I can find a
>>group
>>to do that one.
>>

>You won't. Not for all of them. The only ones who would help you are
>real high levels who know lower guk and who can pull the deepwater >gobs
>out of the way in oasis while you get the rod. All the other rods are
>easy. A group of your level would only end up dead. At best, someone
>will die and you will get away with the rod.

Oh no...I was talking about the rune of scale for the Runescale cloak? I
understand it was supposed to be carried by saltwater crocs in the back
regions of Upper Guk? Sure hope I'm camping the right spot hehe.
But anyway, I think I'll try do the Staff of Wheel over this weekend. I've
been reading the adventures of people on the Graffe site lately...really
interesting the different ways people have been doing this quest. =)

-- Lim'Dul
